resources.string: Enter an amount lower than or equal to your available balance.
Add a bank account so you can send and withdraw money and issue refunds.
Add a bank account or card
We\'re sorry, we were unable to access your balance information.
Add a bank account at paypal.com/uk so you can send money, issue refunds and withdraw money from PayPal to your bank account.
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %1$s hours. Would you like to continue with this transfer\?
You\'re withdrawing money to your bank account using your %1$s
It should only take a few minutes. We\'ll keep you updated on your withdrawal to %1$s
Withdrawals may take a few minutes and vary by bank. All withdrawals are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
Withdrawals can take up to 5 working days.
Estimated arrival: 3-5 working days\nAll transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
We\'re sorry. We\'re unable to complete the transfer.

You\'ll usually see the money in your bank account within minutes when you use your eligible debit card.\n\nA %1$s fee applies. Or, you can use the free, standard option. Withdrawals may take up to 30 minutes and vary by bank.

You\'ll usually see the money in your bank account within minutes when you use your eligible debit card.\n\nA %1$s fee applies. Or, you can use the free, standard option. Withdrawals may take up to 30 minutes and vary by bank.
Add an eligible debit card or bank account
Withdrawals may take up to %1$s and vary by bank. All withdrawals are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
Withdrawals made after 7pm ET or on weekends or holidays may take longer. All withdrawals are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
The amount exceeds the possible %1$s maximum.
Can\'t see all of your bank accounts and cards\?
Certain banks and card providers are not supported.
Since processing times vary by bank, some withdrawals may take up to %1$d %2$s
Your withdrawal will be delayed. Would you still like to continue\?
You\'ve withdrawn money to your bank account using your %1$s
The money will remain in your PayPal balance.

For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %1$s hours, but we\'ll email you as soon as we have an update. You won\'t be charged the fee. Or you can cancel your withdrawal.
We\'re sorry, we weren\'t able to process your transaction. Please make sure you\'re connected to a network and try again.
We\'re sorry, we weren\'t able to cancel your money transfer. Your transaction is still pending.
You requested a withdrawal to your bank account using your %1$s
Something seems to have gone wrong\n
We\'ve successfully confirmed your information and you can continue to use your PayPal balance. You can send it, spend it, or just keep it as a cushion against the unexpected.
You\'ll still be able to withdraw money from PayPal to your linked bank account, but you won\'t be able to use your balance to send or spend for the time being.
You\'ll still be able to withdraw money from PayPal to your linked bank account, but you won\'t be able to use your balance to send or spend for the time being.
You\'ll still be able to withdraw money from PayPal to your linked bank account, but you won\'t be able to use your balance to send or spend for the time being.
We\'ll email you as soon as we\'ve finished reviewing your documents. This usually takes 2-3 working days.\n\nWhile you\'re waiting, you can always withdraw the money to your bank account.
In order to withdraw a partial amount, we need to confirm your identity
If you want to use your remaining PayPal balance to send or spend after you withdraw this amount, we\'ll need a bit more information to confirm your identity.
Regulations require us to take a closer look at some transactions. Your transfer is temporarily pending whilst we review it.
There seems to be a problem
At the moment, we\'re not able to complete this transaction.

Would you like to continue and confirm your identity now\? If you skip this step, you can withdraw money from PayPal to your bank account but you won\'t be able to use your PayPal balance to send or spend money.
Withdraw it to your bank account
Withdraw the money to your bank account in just minutes for a small fee. Or directly to your bank account for free.
Keep it in your PayPal balance
Set up a PayPal Cash account so you can send or spend directly from PayPal.
We\'re sorry, we weren\'t able to create your PayPal Cash account right now. Withdraw the money to your bank account instead.
We\'re sorry, something seems to have gone wrong. \nPlease try again.
